definition: red neckscarf/by extension, a member of the Young Pioneers
neck/collar/to lead/to receive/classifier for clothes, mats, screens etc

sentences.english: Students, and red scarf is a flag of the iceberg.
sentences.chinese: 同學們，紅領巾是國旗的一角。

sentences.english: And of course pioneers wore a red pioneer tie, the main must-have item.
sentences.chinese: 當然，少先隊員們是肯定會帶上紅領巾的。

sentences.english: Look, all of those Young Pioneers are wearing their red scarves .
sentences.chinese: 看，所有的那些少先隊員都戴着紅領巾。

sentences.english: That is good to wear red scarf from the beginning.
sentences.chinese: 那就是先從佩戴好紅領巾開始。

sentences.english: Volunteers learned how to wear the red scarf.
sentences.chinese: 志願者們在學習系紅領巾。

sentences.english: The red kerchief is worn by many first school students in China.
sentences.chinese: 中國的許多小學生都戴紅領巾。

sentences.english: The bright red scarf is Young Pioneer's symbol.
sentences.chinese: 鮮豔的紅領巾就是少先隊員的標誌。

sentences.english: Young Pioneers must wear red scarfs in school.
sentences.chinese: 少先隊員在校內必須佩戴紅領巾。

sentences.english: When we entered primary school, dear teachers gave us the red scarf.
sentences.chinese: 初入小學，老師便爲我們帶上了鮮豔的紅領巾。

sentences.english: If the tie was tied incorrectly a teacher had to reprimand.
sentences.chinese: 如果沒有正確佩戴紅領巾的話，老師會及時的糾正。

sentences.english: He took out a red scarf from his pocket and gave it to his little daughter.
sentences.chinese: 他從口袋裏取出一條紅領巾，給了他的小女兒。

sentences.english: Fourth month, all children had their own red scarfs .
sentences.chinese: 第四個月，所有的孩子都有了紅領巾。

sentences.english: This year, I have the children for a year to bring a bright red scarf.
sentences.chinese: 今年，我也爲一年級的小朋友帶上了鮮豔的紅領巾。

sentences.english: Students are working on the Red Scarf Farm.
sentences.chinese: 學生們在紅領巾農場積極地勞動。

definition: to lift sth up/to elevate sb/to honor sb (with compliments, gifts, promotions etc)/to show great regard/to speak highly/Taiwan pr. [tai2 ju3]
gift given to sb when meeting them for the first time
to talk drivel/to make irresponsible remarks
to cause trouble for sb/to inconvenience
to visit new in-laws after a marriage
